text:
Hadi Jawaid
39 Donnison Street, Manchester
M12 5FR
Tel: +44-7849088822
E-mail: hadijawaid@yahoo.com
Profile
A highly motivated, honest, goal driven, knowledgeable and confident PMP certified (working towards chartership) senior engineer with proven problem solving and project management skills and extensive site/field experience who can work on own initiative or as part of a team. An excellent communicator at all levels within an organisation. Seeking a responsible and challenging technical position in a growth oriented progressive organisation where my skills and experience developed from working in the Power and Life Sciences Industry will significantly contribute to the overall success of the organisation.
Experience
Jul’15 – Present     Bouygues Energies & Services, Manchester, UK
Posi Hadi Jawaid
39 Donnison Street, Manchester
M12 5FR
Tel: +44-7849088822
E-mail: hadijawaid@yahoo.com
Profile
A highly motivated, honest, goal driven, knowledgeable and confident PMP certified (working towards chartership) senior engineer with proven problem solving and project management skills and extensive site/field experience who can work on own initiative or as part of a team. An excellent communicator at all levels within an organisation. Seeking a responsible and challenging technical position in a growth oriented progressive organisation where my skills and experience developed from working in the Power and Life Sciences Industry will significantly contribute to the overall success of the organisation.
Experience
Jul’15 – Present     Bouygues Energies & Services, Manchester, UK
Position: Senior Project Engineer
Key Responsibilities:
Developing project plan, creating installation and commissioning strategy and monitoring progress against project baselines and developing/executing correction strategy to meet project base lines.
Acting process package manager for EPC Contractor and responsible for overseeing installation, commissioning and performance testing of all process, mechanical and utility packages e.g. Steam Boilers and Turbines (Triveni TST 2150 frame), HVAC, Gasifier, RO, compressed air system, materials handling system (flue gas treatment), Sterilizers and abatement system and Fire Fighting and Detection Systems.
Managing change/variation control.
Monitoring and controlling scope, project plan and costs.
Responsible for P/L on project.
Leading group of graduate and commissioning engineers performing functionality and safety checks as per C&E and CTPs.
Executing of commissioning activities for Mechanical and Process packages e.g. Mechanical Systems like Steam Turbine auxiliary systems, Fire Fighting and Detection Systems, HVAC. Process systems like FGT systems, Gasifiers and Sterilizers.
Managing all pressure testing and NDTing of process pipework and vessels as per ASME VIII and B31.1 and discussing results with NoBo.
Representing BYes in monthly Site Progress meetings with end user and investors briefing all major stake holders of progress and strategy during upcoming months.
Liaising with utility companies, third party inspectors and insurers for site approvals and CE/Global CE certification.
Participating in joint inspections following installation and commissioning with clients engineer, generating punch lists and taking corrective action to close snag.
Coordinating with legislative bodies (EA, City Councils) to obtain correct permits for first fire of plant.
Imparting training to operators on different packages covering operation, preventative maintenance and trouble shooting
Notable Project:
Hoddesdon ATT – Hoddesdon, England
A complex EfW project using x2 gasifiers, x2 Steam boilers and a turbine to generate Electricity. In addition to the above, my responsibilities also included:
Identified root cause of failure in site fuel offloading mechanism. Proposed and designed solution for EfW site offloading problem and obtained buy-in from all key stake holders.
Responsible for performance testing and imparting training to end users for respective process packages.
Developed Chemical Cleaning and Steam Blowing strategy with contractor as part of pipe-work commissioning.
Over-saw chemical dosing scheme with plant operations team to achieve correct BFW chemistry for generation of steam for the turbine.
Responsible for all fire detection (VESDA, Flame Detectors) and Fire Suppression System (Water sprinkler system, fire pumps, FM200, Argonite Systems) installation and commissioning.
Overseeing Trevi testing of all safety relief devices using calibrated instruments.
Terumo Vascutek – Glasgow, Scotland
A pharma project, my job role as acting Process Manager was:
Oversee installation and commissioning of process packages and utilities i.e. compressed air system, Sterilizers and abatement system.
Perform validation activities i.e. IQ, PQ and OQ.
Nov’14 – Jun’15    Bouygues Energies & Services, Manchester, UK
Position: Senior Design Engineer
Key Responsibilities:
Technical lead on all process, mechanical equipment

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
